fields.name: displayError
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


Error message:

{!CustomError}

fields.name: displayManualBookingUrlInfo
fields.fieldText:
Heads up!


Because your User's Department is set to IT, you take a different path in the screen flow, allowing you to manually determine the booking url.


Be advised, that the input URL must be a Calendly URL and that it will generally look like


https://calendly.com/[unique-user-slug]/[meeting-slug]

fields.name: S2displayMessage
fields.fieldText:
Event not booked


Event not booked correctly. Make sure to click through the Calendly windows buttons, before clicking complete.


Please, go back and complete the booking.
